pkgmetadata.longdescription: sqlite3dbm==========Description===========This module provides a sqlite-backed dictionary conforming to the dbminterface, along with a shelve class that wraps the dict and providesserialization for it.Installation============* pip install sqlite3dbm* easy_install sqlite3dbmTesting=======* `testify tests` from the root directoryLinks=====* source <http://github.com/Yelp/sqlite3dbm/>* documentation <http://packages.python.org/sqlite3dbm/>
